docs.summary:
Represents the overlay that appears when the hamburger menu is opened. 
It covers the full browser screen when activated.

> **Note:** The hamburger menu can replace the traditional [Menu](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/$w/menu) 
> to save space on smaller screen sizes. Its function is to toggle between a displayed and collapsed menu when triggered.
description: The hamburger overlay is a dark opaque layer that covers the full browser screen
